name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。
schedule:
第1週: 1. Introduction to Materials Science and Engineering
第2週: 2. Atomic Structure
第3週: 3. Atomic and Ionic Arrangements
       4. Imperfections in the Atomic and Ionic Arrangements
第4週: 5. Atom and Ion Movements in Materials
       6. Mechanical Properties: Part One
第5週: 7. Mechanical Properties: Part Two
       8. Strain Hardening and Annealing
第6週: 9. Principles of Solidification
       10. Solid Solutions and Phase Equilibrium
第7週: 11. Dispersion Strengthening and Eutectic Phase Diagrams
       12. Dispersion Strengthening by Phase Transformations and Heat Treatment
第8週: 13. Heat Treatment of Steels and Cast Irons
       14. Nonferrous Alloys
第9週: Midterm Examination
第10週: 15. Ceramic Materials
        16. Polymers
第11週: 17. Composites: Teamwork and Synergy in Materials
第12週: 18. Construction Materials
第13週: 19. Electronic Materials
第14週: 20. Magnetic Materials
第15週: 21. Photonic Materials
第16週: 22. Thermal Properties of Materials
第17週: 23. Corrosion and Wear
第18週: Final Examination
materials:
參考書目References:
1. L. H. Van Vlack, “Elements of Materials Science and Engineering,” Addison-Wesley, 6th edition, 1989.
2. M. Ashby and D. R. H. Jones, “Engineering Materials 1: An Introduction to Properties, Applications and Design,” Butterworth Heineman, 2nd edition, 1996.
3. M. Ashby and D. R. H. Jones, “Engineering Materials 2: An Introduction to Microstructures, Processing and Design,” Butterworth Heineman, 2nd edition, 1998.
